title: Keys to Drawing by Bert Dodson
description:
Anyone who want to learn Drawing and can hold a pencil "Keys to Drawing" by Bert Dodson is most important for his. The writter share a complete drawing system that anyone can use any subject or type of drawing. Even if he have a doubt about his drawing ability. Here you can find-
# 55 specific keys to improving your drawing
# 48 mini-lessons that help you master techniques
# 8 self-evaluation checklist to help you gauge your progress
The book are 226 pages. Published by North light books, Cincinnati, Ohio.

About the author
Bert Dodson, the creator of comic strip 'Nuke" a talented draftsman, painter and illustrator. He take his Graduation from Arizona state University.  After he studied at the school of Visual art in New York City. About many years he taught drawing and illustration At the New York Fashion Institute of Technology. He illuatrated more than 60 books and worked as a animation designer Now he lives with his wife in vermont
